info.name: HEIC/HEIF Image Converter
info.summary: Converts your HEIC/ HEIF images to JPEG
info.description: Very simple app to convert your HEIC/ HEIF files to JPEG using ImagickMagick and the PHP Imagick extension. Needs imagemagick with HEIC support installed and the PHP bindings (Imagick extension) enabled. Check Github for more details.
info.author: major-mayer
